trans-unit.source: Provides a wrapper for converting server components into client script.
trans-unit.target: 提供可將伺服器元件轉換成用戶端指令碼的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an internal dictionary to hold references to components, elements, properties, and events.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用內部字典來保存元件、 元素、 屬性和事件的參考。

trans-unit.source: To populate this dictionary, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddComponentProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddElementProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddProperty%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddEvent%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要填入此字典，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddComponentProperty%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddElementProperty%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddProperty%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method to generate the client script.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成時，呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A>方法來產生用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The type of the target client component.
trans-unit.target: 目標用戶端元件的型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified property, and associates that property with the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的屬性，並讓該屬性與指定的項目產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the specified property to the internal dictionary of properties that are used by the control and converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指定的屬性加入至內部的控制項使用和轉換成由用戶端指令碼的屬性字典<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="componentID" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="componentID" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target element.
trans-unit.target: 目標項目的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified property and associates that property with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的屬性，並讓該屬性與指定的元件產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the specified property to the internal dictionary of properties that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將指定的屬性會轉換成由用戶端指令碼的內容的內部字典<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the handler function for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件的處理常式函式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event and handler.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的事件與處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the event and handler to the internal dictionary of events that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將事件和處理常式加入至事件轉換為用戶端指令碼的內部字典<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified property and value.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的屬性和值。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the property and value to the internal dictionary of properties that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將屬性和值加入至屬性轉換為用戶端指令碼的內部字典<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The script that is rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 呈現至瀏覽器的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified property, and associates the property with the specified script.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的屬性，並讓該屬性與指定的指令碼產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddScriptProperty%2A> method to render script that is not serialized to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddScriptProperty%2A>方法以呈現則不會序列化至瀏覽器的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="script" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="script" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the identifier of the client component.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得用戶端元件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the client component.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端元件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the client script that implements the target control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得可在頁面上實作目標控制項的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The client script that implements the target control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 可在頁面上實作目標控制項的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> 執行個體的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> instance, if set; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor" /> 執行個體的 ID (若有設定)，否則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the target client component.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標用戶端元件的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the target client component.
trans-unit.target: 目標用戶端元件的型別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試將屬性設定為 <see langword="null" />。
